name: LIT 190L
title: Topics in World Literature and Cultural Studies
description: Course topic changes; see the Class Search for current topic. Critical approach designations: Histories, Power and Subjectivities. Distribution requirements: Global, Senior Seminar. May be repeated for credit.

pre_req_data.text: Prerequisite(s): LIT 101. Enrollment is restricted to senior literature majors.

class_notes: Topic: Literature Media and Postcolonial Critique
